text: Hello Cheyenne or Hello Cheyenne! is a 1928 American western film directed by Eugene Forde and starring Tom Mix, Caryl Lincoln and Jack Baston.Jensen p.235 Two rival telephone companies attempt to be the first to connect Cheyenne in Wyoming. ==Cast== * Tom Mix as Tom Remington * Caryl Lincoln as Diana Cody * Jack Baston as Buck Lassiter * Martin Faust as Jeff Bardeen * Joseph W. Girard as Fremont Cody * William Caress as Bus Driver * Al St. John as Zip Coon == References == == Bibliography == * Jensen, Richard D. The Amazing Tom Mix: The Most Famous Cowboy of the Movies. 2005. == External links == * Category:American films Category:1928 Western (genre) films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Films directed by Eugene Forde Category:1928 films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Fox Film films
title: Hello Cheyenne
